ygData.subject: Neo Beast Wars RPG
ygData.msgSnippet: Hell Beast can actually inhale the aroma of death into his robotic lungs. It hung in the air over the icy tundra that streched endlessly around this mountian

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

       Hell Beast can actually inhale the aroma of death into his robotic 
lungs. It hung in the air over the icy tundra that streched endlessly around 
this mountian fortress. The sent stuck on his armor, worked its way into his 
innards where it festered and germinated. This scent was extreamly potent.
       He let his optics wonder to Shockwave who was stil lstanding before 
him. They had just discussed terms for the Neo Decepticon Empire. The plan 
seemed sensible, very well thought out. All he could think of, however, was 
the death that hung in the air around all of them.
       
       Megatron sat like a king on his throne. Before him stood Scorpinox 
with the message of the golden disk. Turning the idea over and over in his 
head he decided to would be best to go and see what was so important. Rampage 
and Marine would go too, as back up and insurence. The 3 of them together 
would be powerful enough to take care of any problem that might arise.
       "Very well Scorpinox. We wil ldepart with you. I trust that this disk 
will be worth my time?" He said, turning a crimsome glare at the bot.

       Ominous Prime and the other Energonians sat within the safety of the 
Orb, deep in the jungles of Madagascar. He was tired of trying to convert the 
other bots. Action needed to be taken. He was going to take out all of them, 
Maximal, Predacon, Vhicon, or Vok. The volcano scheme would go as planned. In 
a few months the earth would resemble the Moon, except streaming a lava blood.
       And the Decepticons would be found. He would use all of his resources 
to find them, and destroy them. He wouldnt be effected, Ominous had already 
taken care of that problem. When the mech of the original Megatron stained 
his energon blade, the Energonians would have won the war. A new enterprise 
would arise, and the old ways would snap under the might of the new ways.

--part1_8a.1df0b75.27ac7a51_boundary
